column1: shortish and swings back in on off, Uthappa presses forward and dabs it defensively to the covers
full outswinger from PK, drags Uthappa forward. He pushes out and nicks an outside edge that could have been gobbled up by second slip. Instead, it runs down to third man
full and swerves in, Gambhir gets forward and blocks it
back of a length and swings on off, nudged in front of midwicket
back of a length and curls in on off, Uthappa gets a drop-and-run single in front of mid-on
good length outswinger, leaves Gambhir. He dangles his bat out and is beaten. By the way, DK is keeping wickets for Lions, not Dwivedi
good length and no swing outside off, Uthappa steps forward and eases it through the covers. Beats mid-off to his left. Just a gentle little push, but the timing was pristine
shortish on middle, tucked to midwicket
pretty full and shapes in on off, cramps the batsman for room, patted to mid-on for one
short and ducks back in, Gambhir is pushed onto the back foot. He ekes out an inside edge to the leg side
length ball outside off, no movement at all, Gambhir has a crack at it and lofts it over mid-off with lots of bottom hand

PK messes it up at mid-on. Hurrying short ball outside off, Gambhir is late onto the pull. He sends a top edge in the air. The fielder back-tracks for the overhead catch. PK can only finger-tip it away. He tumbles onto the ground
this inswinger heads down the leg side, is the catch still playing on his head
good length awayswinger leaves Uthappa after pitching outside off, he chases and is beaten. That wasn't a wide. Tough call from Nandan. PK isn't pleased
veering into the pads, right in the flicking radar. He rolls his wrists and places it to the right of mid-on
short ball angled in, Uthappa gets on top of the bounce and punches it back to the bowler. PK sticks his right hand out and deflects it back onto the stumps. Gambhir backed up, but was back in time
back of a length and outside off, punched crisply. Baz runs to his right, dives full-length to his right, and makes a half-save
length and outside off, run away towards point

Dwayne Smith fluffs a chance at slip. It was a tough chance. PK now watches a chance go down off his own bowling. Cutter 101ks leaves the left-hander with extra bounce. Gambhir wafts and nicks it. Smith flies to his left but the ball does not stick. He can only deflect it to third man for one
shortish and outside off, gets on top of the bounce and manipulates it to mid-on with the wrists

Gambhir isn't lucky on the third time. Phenomenal work from Jakati. Raina jumps onto the fielder. Back of a length on middle, bunted to short midwicket, where Jakati flings full-length to his left and stops the ball with his left hand, collecting and nailing a direct hit at the striker's end in one motion to dismiss Gambhir. Uthappa had slipped near the middle of the pitch, which resulted in a confusion. Jakati showed off his reflexes and Raina was quick to embrace the fielder
tucked around the corner for one
back of a length and outside off, punched to the covers
short and wide outside off, flat-bat swat to the right of mid-off for four. Drilled away
full ball on off, no movement, forward and punchy drive to mid-on
very, very wristy! Good length ball on off, Uthappa presses forward and serenely dispatches it over midwicket with a pick-up shot
length and outside off, Pandey opens the face and runs it away to point
Fullish and outside off, Pandey opens the face of the bat and offers a dolly to Raina at lone slip. He takes it around waist height and throws the ball in the air
inswinging yorker zipping just outside off, Chawla was late to bring his bat down
short and wide outside off, slashed to backward point
short and wide outside off again, Chawla leaps and scythes it over backward point
indipper, cramps the batsman for room. He manages an inside edge onto the pad that drops onto the pitch
back of a length on off, front-foot punch to mid-on
short on middle, extra bounce, beats the wild swing and buzzes through to DK
banged in short on middle, Chawla is tucked up for room. He aims to pull and ends up short-arm flapping past midwicket
leg-side bouncer, sails through to DK. Wided
good length on middle, Uthappa veers across the off stump and flicks it to deep midwicket
112ks offspinner outside off, Chawla loses his shape. He has an early whoosh at it and connects only with thin air

back of a length on middle, another slower ball, sticks in the pitch. Speedgun shows 69kph. Chawla clears his front leg, waits for the ball to arrive. Adjusts and punches on the up over the covers for four
good length and angled in on off, turned to midwicket

Soft, soft dismissal. Good length and moves away a touch off the surface outside off. Some extra bounce as well. There was no slip and the batsman opened the face of the bat, attempting a dab down to third man. He can only run it into the gloves of DK. Second soft dismissal in three overs
gentle short ball outside off, gets on top of the bounce,and pulls to deep midwicket
width outside off, flashed to deep point
leg-side wide
full and angled in on off, the batsman presses forward and blocks it down the ground
rising short ball on off, Yusuf rises with it and fends it to cover. Chawla was too eager for a single but is sent back
starts off with a slower dipping yorker, jammed out to the covers
Bravo lets rip a bouncer outside off, Chawla arches his back but can't get any bat on the ramp. The caught-behind appeal is shot down
Chawla backed outside leg, Bravo floated it at 103ks on middle. Chawla checks his stroke and dabs it with an open face to point
dipping low full toss, Chawla can't get under it. Dragged to long-on
full and straight, Yusuf falls over the flick and works it to midwicket
floated full and outside off, 110ks, Yusuf waits before heaving to long-on
slides in with the arm on middle, 98ks, beats the flick and raps the pad
Yusuf hurries down the track, Jakati fires another hurrying ball and pings the pad
darted on off, no hint of flight, jabbed with a flourish to long-on
pushed through again, this ball stops on Yusuf, foiling his flick. He closes the face early and pops a leading edge past midwicket
Chawla steps out, the bowler drops it short and outside off, swatted to long-on
Jakati nudges close to 100ks, worked to square leg
full and angled in, clipped past square leg

Smith nails the top of middle and is mobbed by his team-mates. The bails fly and the middle stump is pushed back. Smith hits the deck and bowls a back of a length ball that skids on on middle. Chawla, having, backed away does not touch it. He can't squirt it down to third man. Timbaaah! 11 off 16 balls isn't good enough
cutter outside off, guided towards point
back of a length and outside off, tapped to point
short and wide outside off, 130ks, chopped straight to point
Shakib sets off after dabbing a straight back of a length ball. He is forced to retreat
heading down leg, helped down to long leg
tossed outside off, slows this up. Shakin whips a single to long-on
arm-ball, snakes in, Yusuf prods and misses. Takes it on the pad as the ball rolls behind square. DK misses a direct hit
loopier and drifts in on off, front-foot push back to bowler
stump-to-stump line, Yusuf backs away and chops past the covers
full on middle, driven back to the bowler
shortish and outside off, Shakib punches to sweeper cover
slower short ball outside off, keeps low, Yusuf waits and pulls behind square

Smith is on a roll in Kanpur. He removes Shakib too. Bangs a short ball on middle and finds tennis ball-esque extra bounce. Shakib was air borne as he played the upper cut. He picks out the debutant, Dwivedi, at third man
overpitched on off, driven back to the bowler
short and outside off, Surya respects Smith and lets it pass
back of a length, pushed back to the bowler. Smith aims to back-hand flick it back onto the stumps. He misses. He caps a productive spell: 4-0-8-4
skiddy ball on off, dabbed to cover
played up to cover again
down the track and worked to midwicket
whipped off the pads to deep midwicket
floated outside off, driven to long-off
Jadeja lands this on off and finds turn and extra bounce. Forward and prodded to cover
drifting down leg, off the pad and rolls past DK
dangled outside off, Yusuf bends low, slogs from outside off to deep midwicket
looped up on middle, backs away outside leg and drives inside-out to long-off
Pathan goes low, fetches this from outside off, rolls his wrists. Controls a sweep to fine leg
speared short and outside off, forced to the right of sweeper cover
slider on middle, tucked to midwicket. Jakati is tightening the noose
Yusuf backs away outside leg, Jadeja chases him with a short ball and tucks him up. Swatted to deep midwicket
flighted on middle, fuller, tapped down to long-off
fired on off, Yusuf makes room and drills it to the long-off boundary. There is the first boundary after the Powerplay
Yusuf makes some room. The left-arm spinner flight it full. Yusuf likes it and launches it over long-on. Jadeja follows the trajectory of the ball
glanced off the pads to short fine leg
Jadeja fires another quicker one, clipped to leg for one more
full on at 132ks, Surya shuffles across off, uses the pace and laps it over short fine leg for four
slower short ball outside off, waits and flat-bat swats it to sweeper cover
104ks dipping yorker on off. Yusuf checks his slog and jams his bat down on it
floats a slower short ball outside off, Yusuf sizes it up and sends it clattering to the midwicket boundary
this short ball shot up off the surface, beat the hook, and DK took it in front of his face
short on off, 135ks, forehand swat to long-on
quick and flat on off, Yusuf goes deep in the crease and whips to midwicket
short and outside off, stops on the batsman, forced to long-off
pitched up on middle, Yusuf goes low and sweeps to fine leg
tosses this outside off, slower through the air. Surya crouches, steps away outside leg, and laces an inside-out drive over extra cover for six
six and out! Fuller and straighter, Surya goes low for a sweep. He can only top-edge it to Dhawal at the edge of the fine leg boundary. Surya throws his head back in despair
pushed through on middle, stays back and flicks to midwicket
short and rises off the surface on middle, Holder swishes and misses
wide yorker, far too wide outside off
back of a length and outside off, 132ks, Holder aims a leg-side slog and ends up skewing an outside edge. It flies to the right of DK
Bravo looks for a yorker, bowls a full toss, instead. Slapped to long-on
short ball outside off, 130ks, Yusuf skips back and controls a pull to deep midwicket
103ks slower ball outside off, Holder clears his front leg, waits patiently and slugs it into the stands beyond midwicket. It was full and in the slot to be dispatched
off-stump yorker, jabbed back to the bowler
Yusuf shuffles across off and scoops this full toss past short fine leg for four
Yusuf holes out to a full toss. Yet another soft dismissal.  Full toss outside off, Pathan bends his back knee and drives in the air... into the lap of Raina at extra cover. He did not have to budge
back of a length and outside off, Narine slashes and misses
full and aimed at middle, poked back to the bowler
short and bounces over the top of middle, Narine can't connect with a leg-side slog
finishes the over with another lifter, Narine now ramps and misses
Holder jumps outside leg and smears a full toss to long-on
full offcutter on middle, driven to the covers

Bravo does the champion jig and sends Holder off. The exiting batsman shoves the bowler away in a friendly manner. Holder has a wry smile on his face. Bravo then embraces his Gujarat Lions and Melbourne Renegades team-mate Finch. Offcutter on a length, Holder backs away, swings and miscues it over the bowler's head. Finch runs to his right from mid-off and hangs onto the catch, clutching the ball against his chest
swing and a miss outside off
full toss, swiped over midwicket
leg-stump full toss, picked up over midwicket. Just a single off it

Uthappa juggles and gets it on the third attempt! Smith bags a golden duck, after claiming his best T20 figures. He shapes to pull a not-so-short ball that was angled in. He gets an under edge and the keeper hangs onto the catch
full and on middle and leg, stops on Raina. He hangs back and chips it wide of mid-on
even fuller and on the pads, Raina flicks in the air between midwicket and mid-on
back of a length and outside off, punched down the ground
Baz comes down the track, nay he races down the track and clouts this length ball into the stands beyond midwicket
banged in short and down leg, pulls and misses
lifting short ball outside off, Baz aims to pull and manages a bottom edge that does not carry to slip
flat and quick on middle, punched to midwicket
skiddy ball down the leg side, Uthappa is beaten. It hurries away to the fine leg boundary

Narine strikes with his third ball! Ump Chaudhary raises his finger. Looked like a seam-up ball. It swung in and rapped Baz on the back leg in front of middle. There was no inside edge involved and Baz is on his way back. Plumb!
whippy offbreak, turned behind square
full on middle, blocked back to the bowler
overpitched and outside off, driven to short extra cover on the front foot
full on middle, stops on Raina, clipped past midwicket
back of a length and seams away outside off, skewed towards mid-on off the inside half
That's a Raina special! Length ball on middle, he steps away outside leg, collapses his back leg, and crunches an inside-out drive over the covers
width outside off, angled away from the left-hander, run down to third man
141ks, Ankit tests his UP captain with a short ball. He hops and is pinged on the back thigh
Ankit slices the batsman into half. Good length and ducks in a long way from outside off. Zips through the gate and befuddles DK
shortish on middle, nudged to midwicket for one
back of a length and angled in, 140ks, DK drops it in front of his feet
DK steps out and meets a full ball early. Whipped away to the midwicket boundary
bangs a short ball outside off, punched past backward point
Morkel bends his back and delivers another short ball outside off -140ks - DK leaps and rises on top of the bounce, punching through cover
Morne hits back and leaves DK's stumps splayed. It pitched outside off, curved in a long way, then shot through the gate to knock out the middle stump. DK drove and missed the full ball
another inducker, Finch inches forward and pokes towards mid-on
slider on off, knocked to the leg side
pushed through outside off, Finch waits and late-cuts  behind point
extra bounce outside off, 96ks, beaten
offbreak, quicker at 97ks, Finch aims a leaden-footed drive and miscues to long-on off the inside half
full and straight, defended on the front foot
floated on leg, punched down the ground for one
Another Raina special. Right out of the top draw. He stepped out and backed away, driving this back of a length ball inside out over the covers. He passes 4000 IPL runs, passes Kohli as well
tucked through backward square leg
shortish and cut back in, tantalisingly close to the off stump. Tight leave from Finch
good length and outside off, tapped into the covers
bumper down the leg, Raina drops his gloves on it
vicious short ball, 140ks, kicks up and surprises Raina. He hops and gloves it to the off side
yorker on off, jammed to midwicket
full on off, punched to long-on
short and angled in, worked to the leg side. Finch calls for a couple and gets it
leg-side wide
short on the hips, glanced to fine leg
Ankit cranks up to 145ks, another bumper, flies to Uthappa. Raina leaves it be. The square-leg ump calls it a wide
117ks cutter down the leg side, Uthappa is beaten as well. The bowler shakes his head. It bounced in front of Uthappa, kissed his glove, and ran away. He should have got his body behind the ball
good length and extra bounce outside off, 145ks, Raina drives and gets an outside edge past Uthappa
overpitched and outside off, Raina drives crisply to sweeper cover
pitched up and slants away outside off, past the outside edge. Loose drive and a miss
back of a length on middle, picked away to midwicket
back of a length on off, Finch presses forward and blocks
shortish and outside off, quelled to point
fuller and just outside off, in the slot, Finch pings it over wide long-on with lots of bottom hand for a flat six
back of a length and angled in, nudged to midwicket

136ks leg-stump short ball, Raina swivels on the back foot for a pull. He was early on the shot and lost his balance. Skewed off the back of the bat over the left shoulder of Uthappa, the ball goes fine of third man for four
short and angled in, played back to the bowler
short and flies over the leg stump, beats the hook
length, angled in, and seams away past the hanging bat. Holder uses his height to find extra bounce
tucked off the hips to midwicket
banged in on middle, fended to midwicket
pitched up on off, driven to long-off
Finch skips out and drills a length ball to long-on
keeps to his crease against a skidder that doesn't turn and taps it to cover
good length on middle, moves into the right-hander, who has spotted it and blocks

the movement to the leg side was premeditated, Narine attempted to one-up Finch by bowling the ball wider, but his length was short. So it allowed the batsman to get under the ball and launch it over extra cover
pushed through down leg, Finch tries a leg glance, but can't connect
gets low to scoop the ball over fine leg before the bowler had been in his delivery stride. Narine adjusts and bowls it quicker, fuller and outside off. Finch pats it to third man

Collision! Gone! Eish! Raina had nudged it off his pads and up to the second run, it was all perfect. Jolly old jog, in fact. But as they turned for the third run, both batsmen, in an attempt to avoid each other, ironically, smash into each other. Raina coming to the bowler's end was moving to his right, Finch running to the batsman's end was moving to his left and they suddenly had each other in their sights. The throw comes in and Uthappa whips the bails off
flighted on middle stump, defended. Jadeja in with 28 off 62 needed
full and angled away just a shade outside off, tapped back to the bowler. Holder collects the ball and aims a direct hit. He misses. Raina dives full-length to make his ground
fullish and on the pads, Raina can't connect with a flick
short on off, run away past point for one
banged in short on middle, Holder gets extra bounce as well. Jadeja hops and gloves it square on the off side
dug in short and outside off, Raina gets inside the line. He rolls his wrists and pulls it behind square
Holder bangs another short ball, but it's not short enough. Raina pulls to the midwicket boundary. The batsman backed away and connected well, even as the bowler chased him
full and slides on middle, Jadeja aims a leg-side flick and nearly spoons a leading edge to Gambhir at short cover
shorter and outside off, swatted to long-on
flat on middle, punched past the bowler. Raina examines the toe end of the bat
leg-stump length ball, tapped wide of the square-leg ump
fired short on middle, punched to long-on
heading down leg, tickled to fine leg
dabbed to midwicket for one
short on off, punched to cover
round-armish ball, fizzes in, cramps the batsman for room. He cuts and squirts an inside edge onto the pad
Raina goes outside leg, collapses his back leg and unfurls another top inside-out drive over the covers, this brings up his half-century
pushed back to the bowler
Raina makes room outside leg again, Yusuf follows him with a flat dart. Squeezed back to the bowler
full and outside off, Jadeja clears his front leg and muscles it past mid-on who is in the circle
shorter and angling away, helped to third man
back of a length on off, Raina leaps and stylishly whips it to square leg to seal Gujarat Lions' six-wicket win
